channel.title: FIXED. Error: Could not find or load main class Gui?

item.title: FIXED. Error: Could not find or load main class Gui?
item.dc:creator: @crimsonbow13 crimsonbow13
item.description:
@crimsonbow13 wrote:

[quote=“Pker DX, post:2, topic:535970”][quote author=crimsonbow13 link=topic=654776.msg4385300#msg4385300 date=1385196208]
So hey guys, I was browsing for about two-three hours for a source that I’d like to use as a base for my new project. I finally found one, edited and updated all my ‘Run’ files Java directs and they are all working in my server folder, but my Client won’t Run! I get that Error up there. Could not find or load main class Gui. When my Gui.class is in place and intact! Help?
[/quote]
show me the root directory of the desktop to client, where the gui is and a copy of the run.bat.
ill fix it[/quote]

Well as much as I understand what you mean by show you the root directory, which I do, I don’t know how to show you it. Besides like:

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/812/2v1o.png/][/URL]

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/199/6jpy.png/][/URL]

Read full topic
item.source: FIXED. Error: Could not find or load main class Gui?

@Pker_DX wrote:

crimsonbow13:

So hey guys, I was browsing for about two-three hours for a source that I’d like to use as a base for my new project. I finally found one, edited and updated all my ‘Run’ files Java directs and they are all working in my server folder, but my Client won’t Run! I get that Error up there. Could not find or load main class Gui. When my Gui.class is in place and intact! Help?

show me the root directory of the desktop to client, where the gui is and a copy of the run.bat.
ill fix it
